Rik Cruys

A solid, sound & seasoned Management, Executive & Team Coach, internationally available, who facilitates individuals & teams to their potential satisfaction, success and direction, within the potential of their design.

+ 31 - (0)6 - 8540 1716

* MANAGEMENT & EXECUTIVE COACHING: a 3 to 6 month Individual coaching process with 6 to 12 bi weekly sessions for managers and executives to meet, learn and integrate their unique Design.

* ONGOING COACHING: following on their 3 to 6 month (6 to 12 session) individual coaching process, the possibility for managers and executives to continue in a yearlong process of 12 monthly sessions for a continual update and further deepening of their personal skills.

* TEAM ENGINEERING & TEAM START UPS: placing the individual and unique designs of all team players in a complete team composite chart, matching underlying chemistries, mechanics and frequencies. Creating successful new teams and making dysfunctional, distressed teams successful again.

* MASTER BRAIN (MIND) GROUPS: (inhouse & outhouse) for companies, Boards, teams and departments ranging from a process of monthly sessions over 3 to 6 months to 1 year. 

* MEDIATION & PARTNERSHIP ANALYSIS: pointing partners to their companionship, electro magnetic, compromise and dominance strengths, thus showing precisely where they match, inspire or confront. With this gained awareness and insight partners are more capable of understanding, working with and complementing each other with their unique differences.

* EXECUTIVE SELECTION & RECRUITMENT: contributing seamlessly to the selection and recruitment process of executives by aligning their specific design to the required executive job profile at hand.

* Companies I work(ed) for as Coach:
ING Group, RABO Bank, ABN-AMRO Bank, BMW, Siemens, Hercules, Xerox, 3M, AON, Agfa, IBM, KPN, Imation, Merck, Sharp & Dohme, Bristol Myers Squibb, Medtronic, Vitatron, Pfizer, Pharmacia Upjohn, Smith Kline Beecham, Deloitte, KPMG & VGZ.

profile_positions.description:
I coach managers, executives, leaders and teams in business, culture, sports and politics.

With a broad experience of 20+ years in international 5 star hotel management, 10+ years in executive  & management coaching, I regard myself as a solid, sound and seasoned coach.

In these past 10 years, I have facilitated more than 300 people in individual processes of 3 to 6 months, thus more than 4.000 'flying hours' of coaching.

My coaching, consulting, mediation, team engineering & assistance with executive search & recruitment distinguishes itself by bringing people and teams into their strength, potential and qualities by laying bare their individual designs, their own unique blueprints. No two people alike.

I believe my coaching is crucial and paramount in the forthcoming times of Individuation. We are entering into an age of deeply Individualistic Self Empowerment, whereby the social securities, structures and support systems in society are slowly but surely falling away. It is a time for people to learn to know their own uniqueness in order to stand on their own feet, within the context of their own partnerships, and small and/or large businesses.

My coaching background is in the expertise of NLP, Spiral Dynamics, Myers Briggs Type Indicator, Ned Herrmann left/right Brain Dominance, and some professional experiences with 360 Degrees Feedback and Family & Organisational Constellations, and foremost now with the transformative work of Human Design, which gives me a broad, varied and deep base of knowledge and expertise to work from for your (individual & team) coaching.

I have currently added the profound, transformative and deep work of BG5 (the business adaptation to the awareness work of Human Design, which has been tested and emperically proven for over 20 years now) to my repertoire. I know it is the next breakthrough in human & business consciousness and awareness.
